category: Other Disease of Public Health Importance

case_definition.suspected: Any person with persistent fever not responding to antimalarial or antibiotics, with headache, sore throat, vomiting or bleeding.
case_definition.probable: A suspected case with epidemiological link or bleeding tendencies.
case_definition.confirmed: Positive RT-PCR or ELISA for Lassa virus.

public_health_actions: Initiate supportive care and refer to treatment center
Deploy rapid response team and begin risk communication
lab_confirmation: RT-PCR or ELISA for Lassa virus.
